title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must identify the percentage of bilingual Latino adults in the United States using the internet in 2009.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the most significant increase in Internet usage in Chart B.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about how the increase identified in part B affects the trend in Chart A.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how a trend identified in Chart B could influence campaign strategies after 2015.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
